pages.title: Class Focus
pages.text: The mages belong to the $(l:classes/mercenary)mercenary$() class. It may be misunderstood but no, although the mage uses ranged attacks he is not a ranger. This is mostly because mages attacks should be able to ignore armor.

pages.title: Weapon Focus
pages.text: The weapon focus of the mage is a bow, or a wand. The arrows shot from this bow are considered magic like projectiles.

pages.title: The Wand
pages.text: When a bow is used by a mage, he gains +50% projectile damage. However there is one exception, any weapon with the enchantment 'Legendary Weapon: Wand' also gains this boost, no matter the weapon. Do note that for this ability $(l:other/ranger_time)ranger time$() is used.

pages.title: Unique Ability
pages.text: Using their magic projectiles to deal great amounts of damage, the mages have another ability that deals against heavily armored warriors. On hit the mages give the poison I effect for (time) which can be done every (time). Do note that for this ability $(l:other/ranger_time)ranger time$() is used.
